<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Demonblood Frenzy](/Feats.aspx?ID=2761) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Prerequisites**
tusks [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack

**Access**
Matanji ethnicity

**Trigger**
You successfully Strike a living creature that has the [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) trait with your tusks unarmed attack

</column>

---

Just the taste of fiendish blood is enough to send blood rushing through your veins in a supernatural fury. You become [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) until the end of your next turn and you can use the extra action to make a tusks Strike, Stride, or Step.
name: Demonblood Frenzy
